description.value:
Installing a series of powerful magnetic gadgets and fields in your firearm's barrel or your arrow’s rest, you charge your invention with lightning before firing a powerful shot. Make a ranged strike with your invention, doubling your invention’s range increment. On a hit, the target takes normal damage, plus an additional 1d4 points of lightning damage for each die of damage your invention deals.

Overcharge Function The damage dice for the additional lightning damage increases to 1d8. Your ammunition retains the magnet's charge, creating a brief magnetic field around the target. The target takes @Damage[(max(1, floor(@actor.level/2)))[persistent,electricity]] damage equal to half your level. For as long as the target is taking this persistent damage, creatures gain a +1 status bonus to all attack rolls against the target with metal weapons or effects with the lightning trait, and the target takes a –1 status penalty to all saving throws against effects with the lightning trait.

value.value: your invention is in the bow, crossbow, or firearm weapon group
